Title: Relates to transferring funds from the New York state campaign finance fund to the department of education to provide school aid
Summary: Transfers up to $100 million dollars from the New York state campaign finance fund to the department of education to provide school aid up to the amount of the pandemic adjustment which reduced school funding.
LawCode: Amd ยง92-t, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to reimbursing school districts for the pandemic adjustment out of moneys in the New York state campaign finance fund
